VALUE.Title: VALUE
VALUE.SafeA: Multiple assets secured with encrypted storage.
VALUE.OpenA: A transparent and open clearing ecosystem.

ECOSYSTEM.Title: ECOSYSTEM
ECOSYSTEM.TitleB: A new model of clearing and settlement
ECOSYSTEM.TitleC: to solve safety and trust issues
ECOSYSTEM.coreA: The Clearing Chain is the core product of the DAEX ecosystem.
ECOSYSTEM.coreB: It provides institution and individual customers with a unified clearing and settlement service using distributed ledger technology.
ECOSYSTEM.walletA: The DAEX wallet supports multiple assets, which are accessed using a multi-segment key.
ECOSYSTEM.walletB: Multiple encryptions keep the wallet safe and secure.
ECOSYSTEM.walletC: End users have full control and ownership of their assets.
